ModMetaData.name: Dense Biomes
ModMetaData.author: kuroneko871
ModMetaData.description: Inspired by HelpfulBot's Increased Forest Density. This mod makes certain biomes have a more dense flora. Biomes affected are Boreal Forest, Temperate Forest, and Tropical Jungle. It also adds support for 3 Terra Core biomes; Mountain Spires, Savanna and Oasis. It also adds support to Vegetable Garden wild fruit trees and plants, meaning they also get a higher spawn chance. Make sure to load at the lowest possible position so it can overwrite the changes.
